title: Javier Berasaluce
text: Javier Berasaluce Marquiegui (born 4 January 1931 in Deba, Guipuzcoa) was a Spanish <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a>. He played in <a href="La%20Liga">La Liga</a> with <a href="Real%20Madrid%20C.F.">Real Madrid</a>, <a href="Deportivo%20Alav%C3%A9s">Deportivo Alavés</a> and <a href="Racing%20de%20Santander">Racing de Santander</a>.
